returns._0: The timestamp at which the beacon period ends.
The number of seconds remaining until the beacon period can be complete.

params.currentTime: The timestamp to use as the current time

returns._0: The timestamp at which the next beacon period would start
True if a draw can be completed, false otherwise.
True if a draw can be started, false otherwise.

completeDraw().details: Completes the draw request, creates a new draw on the DrawHistory and reset beacon period start.

returns._0: The block number that the RNG request is locked to

params._beaconPeriodSeconds: The duration of the beacon period in seconds
params._beaconPeriodStart: The starting timestamp of the beacon period.
params._drawHistory: The address of the draw history to push draws to

returns._0: True if the beacon period is over, false otherwise
True if a random number request has completed, false otherwise.
True if a random number has been requested, false otherwise.
True if a random number request has timed out, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.beaconPeriodSeconds: The new beacon period in seconds.  Must be greater than zero.

setDrawHistory(address).details: External function to set DrawHistory from an authorized manager.

params.rngService: The address of the new RNG service interface

params._rngTimeout: The RNG request timeout in seconds.

startDraw().details: The RNG-Request-Fee is expected to be held within this contract before calling this function

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

BeaconPeriodSecondsUpdated(uint256).notice: Emit when the drawPeriodSeconds is set.

BeaconPeriodStarted(address,uint256).notice: Emit when a draw has opened.

DrawCancelled(address,uint32,uint32).notice: Emit when a draw has been cancelled.

DrawCompleted(address,uint256).notice: Emit when a draw has been completed.

DrawHistoryTransferred(address,address).notice: Emit when a new DrawHistory has been set.

DrawStarted(address,uint32,uint32).notice: Emit when a draw has started.

Initialized(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Emit when the DrawBeacon is initialized.

RngServiceUpdated(address).notice: Emit when a RNG service address is set.

RngTimeoutSet(uint32).notice: Emit when a draw timeout param is set.

beaconPeriodEndAt().notice: Returns the timestamp at which the beacon period ends

beaconPeriodRemainingSeconds().notice: Returns the number of seconds remaining until the beacon period can be complete.

beaconPeriodStartedAt().notice: Epoch timestamp when beacon period can start

calculateNextBeaconPeriodStartTime(uint2.notice: Calculates when the next beacon period will start.

canCompleteDraw().notice: Returns whether an draw request can be completed.

canStartDraw().notice: Returns whether an draw request can be started.

cancelDraw().notice: Can be called by anyone to cancel the draw request if the RNG has timed out.

completeDraw().notice: Completes the draw request and creates a new draw.

getLastRngLockBlock().notice: Returns the block number that the current RNG request has been locked to.

getLastRngRequestId().notice: Returns the current RNG Request ID.

isBeaconPeriodOver().notice: Returns whether the beacon period is over

isRngCompleted().notice: Returns whether the random number request has completed.

isRngRequested().notice: Returns whether a random number has been requested

isRngTimedOut().notice: Returns whether the random number request has timed out.

nextDrawId().notice: Next draw id to use when pushing a new draw on DrawHistory

rngTimeout().notice: RNG Request Timeout.  In fact, this is really a "complete award" timeout. If the rng completes the award can still be cancelled.

setBeaconPeriodSeconds(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to set the beacon period in seconds.

setRngService(address).notice: Sets the RNG service that the Prize Strategy is connected to

setRngTimeout(uint32).notice: Allows the owner to set the RNG request timeout in seconds. This is the time that must elapsed before the RNG request can be cancelled and the pool unlocked.

startDraw().notice: Starts the award process by starting random number request.  The beacon period must have ended.
